SEARCH
Package Controller

Class AppointmentController

java.lang.Object
Controller.AppointmentController
public class AppointmentController extends Object
The AppointmentController class handles all operations related to appointments, including creating, updating, and viewing appointments for doctors and patients.

  • Method Details

    • createAppointment

      public void createAppointment(String doctorId, String patientId, String time, String date)
      Creates a new appointment and saves it in the system.
      Parameters:
      doctorId - the ID of the doctor for the appointment
      patientId - the ID of the patient for the appointment
      time - the time of the appointment
      date - the date of the appointment in dd-MM-yyyy format

    • createNewAppointmentID

      public String createNewAppointmentID()
      Creates a new unique appointment ID based on the existing appointments in the system.
      Returns:
      a new unique appointment ID

    • getAppointment

      public Appointment getAppointment(String appointmentId)
      Retrieves an appointment by its ID.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - the ID of the appointment to retrieve
      Returns:
      the Appointment object with the given ID

    • getAllAppointment

      public List<Appointment> getAllAppointment()
      Retrieves all appointments from the system.
      Returns:
      a list of all appointments

    • getAppointmentsByDoctorID

      public List<Appointment> getAppointmentsByDoctorID(String docId)
      Retrieves all appointments for a particular doctor, including completed and cancelled ones.
      Parameters:
      docId - the doctor's ID
      Returns:
      a list of appointments associated with the given doctor ID

    • getApprovedAppointmentsByDoctorID

      Returns:
      a list of approved appointments associated with the given doctor ID

      Retrieves all pending appointments for a particular doctor on a specific date.
      Parameters:
      docId - the doctor's ID
      date - the date of the appointments in dd-MM-yyyy format
      Returns:
      a list of pending appointments for the given doctor ID on the specified date

    • updateAppointmentSchedule

      public void updateAppointmentSchedule(String appointmentId, String doctorId, String date, String time, Boolean approve)
      Updates the schedule for an appointment and manages doctor's availability accordingly.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - the appointment ID to update
      doctorId - the doctor's ID for the appointment
      date - the date of the appointment in dd-MM-yyyy format
      time - the time of the appointment
      approve - a flag indicating whether the appointment is approved
